translations: n.行动迟缓的人；笨拙迟钝的人

phrs.translation: 慢性子, 行动迟缓的人, 慢性子的人, 时代落伍者

sentences.sentence: "Come on, slowcoach," said Frank, pushing up the pace still more.
sentences.translation: “快点，你个慢性子，”法兰克说，一边加快了步伐

sentences.sentence: He does anything at at a snail's pace.He is really a slowcoach.
sentences.translation: 他做什么事情都慢吞吞地。真是个名副其实的慢性子。
